title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion euros, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Spending in billion euros has increased over the Year
Spending in billion euros is slightly constant from 2012 to 2028.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2028.
Max Spending in billion euros about 131.4 was recorded at Year 2028
Min Spending in billion euros about 107.2 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Spending in billion euros, with a total of 8 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2028.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2012 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2014 to 2015.
